post.desc:
Junko is obviously unknown 'cause... I don't think she has ever set foot on Gens≈çky≈ç, has she? I mean, pretty much everybody in LoLK's been to Gens≈çky≈ç, right? Seiran and Ringo were fought as bosses in Gens≈çky≈ç, not mention currently live there. Doremy is playable in ULiL and AoCF.  Sagume has visited Eientei. And Hecatia brought Clownpiece over in VFiS.

What about Junko? ü§® If I were to guess, she'd definitely find a lot in common with the Taoists. She's a xian. A xian ghost, but still- Wait... was Junko also a wicked xian? Is this what awaits Seiga?
